name: SLIT- Text Adventure Game
description:
Based off the Japanese folktale of Kuchisake-onna (口裂け女), known as the Slit-Mouth-Woman. Enjoy this short story of a student walking down either a tunnel, or alley. You choose your own outcome. There is no true ending, but try to find the path that will lead to a nice repetition.

This is text adventure game that was designed during my game design/ development  courses.
